step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in the next repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you lift.
Excellent work sliding your hands behind your head and spreading your elbows wide. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the stretch for 30 seconds is great. Ensure you maintain an upright head position and avoid leaning forward.
Returning to the start position smoothly is good. Keep up the controlled movements for the remaining repetitions.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your head up and avoid leaning forward. Focus on keeping your elbows close when raising your hands.
